ValidationRule.description: Checks if Assessment Outcome Summary field has value when moving an Engagement with Commercialisation record type from Evaluation to Development stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Commercialisation", ISCHANGED(Stage_Name__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage_Name__c) ,"Evaluation"), ISPICKVAL(Stage_Name__c, "Development"), ISBLANK(Assessment_Outcome_Summary__c) )
